title: Bigg Boss OTT
overview: Sass aur Sazish, Drama aur Romance... itna over the top ke TV pe ban ho jayega! Karan Johar flags off the first-ever, the digital-only season of Bigg Boss with the bigg promise of gossip, controversies & uncensored drama. And let's just say... he's going to take it ALL #OverTheTop!
